debt.title: Debt Calculation
debt.info_message:
This number ({{total}}) is calculated by subtracting the prayers you have performed from your total prayer obligation since the 'Puberty Date' you specified in your profile.

Formula: (Days Passed x 5) - Performed

Note: You can edit this number from the Profile > Personal Info screen.

settings.about_description: Farz is an application developed to help Muslims track their prayer and fasting debts.
settings.features_list:

settings.privacy_data_collection_text: Farz app only stores personal information (name, surname, birth date, gender) and worship records entered by you locally on your device. This data is never shared with third parties.
settings.privacy_security_text: All your data is stored encrypted in your device's local database. The application does not require internet connection and your data is under your control only.
settings.privacy_notifications_text: Local notifications are used for prayer reminders. These notifications are created only on your device and no data is sent outside.
settings.privacy_data_deletion_text: You can permanently delete all your data using the "Reset Data" option in Settings. This action cannot be undone.
settings.privacy_changes_text: This privacy policy may be updated from time to time. You will be informed within the application when there are significant changes.
settings.name: Name
settings.reset_data_confirm: All your local data (worship records, settings) will be deleted. Unbacked data will be lost. Are you sure?
settings.logout_confirm: Are you sure you want to log out? Your local data will not be deleted.
settings.backup_restore_desc: Backup your data to keep it safe or restore from an old backup.
settings.prayer_reminder_desc: Turn on reminders to get notified when prayer times enter.
